sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Younger son of Sophie and Salo Guttmann, nephew of Heinrich Schenker, younger brother of Hans and Frieda.

For further information on the Guttmann family, see Sophie Guttman. While his parents and sister Frieda returned from the family's wartime exile in Bielitz (Poland), via Vienna and Vincovci (Croatia) to Sereth, Julian remained in Vienna with his older brother Hans, where he passed his school-leaving examination. In October 1919 he was in an Export Academy. He visited his uncle Heinrich regularly every Saturday in autumn of that year. His birthday fell in July.
No correspondence between Julian Guttmann and the Schenkers is known to survive.
